author: battibass
body:
#### PR description:

This is a **backport of PR #44847**.

It implements a bugfix, basted on the results of the first tentative of automating the production of the MUDPG custom NANO ntuples described in [this JIRA ticket](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/PDMVRERECO-83), intended to be deployed in production this year.

#### PR validation:

No changes expected in `runTheMartrix.py` workflows `-w nano -l 2500.312,2500.313`.

Change in event content if the `cmsDriver.py` command picked [here](https://cms-pdmv-prod.web.cern.ch/rereco/api/requests/get_cmsdriver/ReReco-Run2024B-Muon0-ZMu_PromptMUODPGNano-00001) is ran under `CMSSW_14_0_X`.

Were both verified.
title: [14_0_X] Apply MUDPGNANO EventContent customizations to EDMNANO and NANOSIM as well
